name: Qrgui
tagline: An easy to use, minimalistic QR code generator.
body:
## About
Qrgui is an easy to use, minimalistic, GUI-based wrapper for qrencode, a QR code generator.

What does that mean?
    You can generate QR codes through a minimalistic, simple interface without using the command line at all.

Qrgui is free software, released under the [GNU General Public License](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0-standalone.html) (See the
LICENSE file for more details.)

## Disclaimer of Warranty
Qrgui is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

## Dependencies
Both qrencode and zenity must be installed for this script to work.
zenity is used to make the GUI dialog boxes, qrencode generates the QR code.

To install the required dependencies with the apt-get package manager,
run this command: sudo apt-get install qrencode zenity
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
